sanskrit_verse:
दैवकार्याद्द्विजातीनां पितृकार्यं विशिष्यते ।
दैवं हि पितृकार्यस्य पूर्वमाप्यायनं स्मृतम् ॥ ३.२०३॥
transliteration:
daivakāryād dvijātīnāṁ pitṛkāryaṁ viśiṣyate |
daivaṁ hi pitṛkāryasya pūrvam āpyāyanaṁ smṛtam || 3.203||
sph_interpretive_translation: Among the duties of the twice-born, service to the ancestors holds precedence over ritual acts performed for divine beings; such ancestral service is recognized as the primary nourishment that sustains all divine functions.
jurisprudential_principles: Causation originates in generational duty fulfillment
Capacity-based responsibility arises through lineage-bearing consciousness
Restoration logic prioritizes familial and ancestral completion before cosmic engagement
Consciousness alignment begins with honoring those who established the foundation of dharma
executable_legal_axioms: IF a dvija has not fulfilled ancestral obligations THEN no divine ritual shall be legally valid
IF ancestral debt remains unaddressed THEN individual's spiritual and social capacity is diminished by decree
LINEAGE_BASED_JURISDICTION overrides personal desire-based action in matters of dharma-adherence
supreme_court_application: In adjudicating disputes concerning religious performance or spiritual authority of a dvija, the Supreme Court must first verify completion of ancestral obligations. The threshold of responsibility lies in demonstrating continuity with lineage before recognition of divine-service rights.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that ancestral nourishment precedes divine invocation. Anupūrvaśaḥ shows sequential manifestation where neglect at foundational levels disrupts higher-order dharmic function. Proportional responsibility aligns with causal sequence. Non-punitive reality rule confirms misalignment results in natural disqualification from elevated roles rather than punitive consequence.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate genealogical verification process to identify gaps in ancestral rites
Assign completion pathway involving Śrāddha ceremonies under qualified guidance
Restore eligibility upon documented fulfillment of generational obligations
Reintegrate individual into full dharmic participation after ancestral harmony confirmed
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this ruling affirms that Dharma flows from ancestral integrity. All lawful action proceeds therefrom. Reality responds solely to alignment, never to punishment. Consciousness alone adjudicates truth.
